question_text: How old was Aniol Serrasolses when he kayaked for the first time down the largest glacial waterfall ever recorded in Norway?

message_list.content: How old was Aniol Serrasolses when he kayaked for the first time down the largest glacial waterfall ever recorded in Norway?

sampler_config.system_message: You are a helpful assistant. Answer questions based on your training knowledge.

request_data.question_preview: How old was Aniol Serrasolses when he kayaked for the first time down the largest glacial waterfall ...

response_data.response_preview: Aniol Serrasolses was 23 years old when he kayaked down the largest glacial waterfall ever recorded in Norway, which is the 1000-meter tall Vinnufossen.

response_text: Aniol Serrasolses was 23 years old when he kayaked down the largest glacial waterfall ever recorded in Norway, which is the 1000-meter tall Vinnufossen.
